title: [Health] In a world's first, new BMJ Global Health study shows quantitatively how precarity pushes people into seemingly problematic antibiotic use behaviour and drives a reliance on "quick fix" solutions - efforts to improve security of livelihoods could therefore help tackle anti-microbial resistance
